scripts.test-cov: node ./node_modules/babel-cli/bin/babel-node.js ./node_modules/isparta/bin/isparta cover --report lcov --report text --report html ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha  -- --reporter dot tests/**/*.spec.js
scripts.test-travis: node ./node_modules/babel-cli/bin/babel-node.js ./node_modules/isparta/bin/isparta cover --report lcov ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha  -- --reporter dot tests/**/*.spec.js && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
